verbs.description: [ARG0: Ivanka Trump] [V: headed] [ARG1: into work at the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-MNR: in a white sundress] , [ARGM-ADV: while her husband Jared saw their two eldest children off to school] .
Ivanka Trump headed into work at the White House on Friday in a white sundress , while [ARG0: her husband Jared] [V: saw] [ARG1: their two eldest children] [ARGM-LOC: off to school] .
